author: markt
msg: -1 is not a supported option for maxConnections with the APR connector so don't allow it.
Also prevent updates while the connector is running which is also unsupported.

author: stsp
msg: On the log-message-templates branch, reinstate a check that prevents

author: stsp
msg: On the log-message-templates branch, support log templates during
commit operations which don't use a working copy.
(svn_client_get_log_message_templates): Support URLs as well as paths.
